query.statement:
SELECT SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM017.BUDAT) AS BUDAT , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM017.CA_DT) AS CA_DT , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM017.CA_TM) AS CA_TM , MM017.CHAR1 AS CHAR1 , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM017.CHDAT) AS CHDAT , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM017.CHTIM) AS CHTIM , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM017.CR_DAT) AS CR_DAT , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM017.CR_TIM) AS CR_TIM , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM017.DDATE) AS DDATE , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM017.DEL_DATE) AS DEL_DATE , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM017.DEL_TIME) AS DEL_TIME , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM017.DTIME) AS DTIME , MM017.EBELN AS EBELN , MM017.EBELP AS EBELP , MM017.EDATE AS EDATE , MM017.EINDT AS EINDT , MM017.EKGRP AS EKGRP , MM017.ETIME AS ETIME , MM017.EXTWG AS EXTWG , MM017.FIELD AS FIELD , MM017.GROES AS GROES , MM017.INFNR AS INFNR , MM017.INS_Q AS INS_Q , MM017.INVITEM AS INVITEM , MM017.INVNR AS INVNR , MM017.IN_DT AS IN_DT , MM017.IN_TM AS IN_TM , MM017.KNTTP AS KNTTP , MM017.LGOBE AS LGOBE , MM017.LGORT AS LGORT , MM017.LIFNR AS LIFNR , (MM011.MATNR_NM ||','|| MM011.ZSIZE ||','|| MM011.SPEC) AS MAKTX , MM017.MANDT AS MANDT , MM017.MATNR AS MATNR , MM017.MBLNR AS MBLNR , MM017.MBLPO AS MBLPO , MM017.MEINS AS MEINS , MM017.MENGE AS MENGE , MM017.B_MENGE AS B_MENGE , MM017.NAME1 AS NAME1 , SAPHEE.GET_CURRDATA(MM017.WAERS,MM017.NETPR) AS NETPR , MM017.POSID AS POSID , MM017.POST1 AS POST1 , MM017.POTYPE AS POTYPE , MM017.PRO_F AS PRO_F , MM017.PSTYP AS PSTYP , MM017.QM_CHK AS QM_CHK , MM017.RDATE_P AS RDATE_P , MM017.RECE_DATE AS RECE_DATE , MM017.RECE_TIME AS RECE_TIME , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM017.SDATE) AS SDATE , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM017.STIME) AS STIME , MM017.STO_MBLNR AS STO_MBLNR , MM017.STO_MBLPO AS STO_MBLPO , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM017.UDATE) AS UDATE , MM017.USABIL AS USABIL , MM017.VALUE AS VALUE , MM017.WAERS AS WAERS , MM017.WERKS AS WERKS , MM017.WERKS_TXT AS WERKS_TXT , MM017.ZEINR AS ZEINR ,CASE WHEN MM025.SHIPDAT1 IS NULL THEN '00000000' WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO = '' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT2 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'A%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT1 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'B%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT2 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'C%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT3 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'D%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT4 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'E%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT5 ELSE '00000000' END AS SHIPDAT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT017 AS MM017 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT011 AS MM011 ON MM017.MANDT = MM011.MANDT AND MM017.MATNR = MM011.MATNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT013 AS MM013 ON MM017.MANDT = MM013.MANDT AND MM017.EBELN = MM013.EBELN AND MM017.EBELP = MM013.EBELP LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT025 AS MM025 ON MM017.MANDT = MM025.MANDT AND SUBSTR(MM017.POSID,1,9) = MM025.POSID AND MM025.PSTYPE = '02' WHERE MM017.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM017.INVNR = #INVNR#
AND SUBSTR(MM017.POSID,1,7) = #POSID#
AND SUBSTR(MM017.POSID,1,6) = #POSID#
AND MM017.UDATE = #UDATE# AND MM017.MATNR = #MATNR# AND MM017.POTYPE = '' FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
